# SWFSC Cloud Migration Flow Chart {.unnumbered}
## Work in progress!!

### Motivation
  * NMFS on-prem servers decomissioned 12/2026
  * staff departure

### Goals
  * data preservation
  * increase collaboration
  * reduce data silos

### Considerations
  * users
  * size of data
  * need specific application?
  * data organization?
  * actively worked on or just needing archiving?
  * complexity
  * find-ability
  * potential cost
